document_data.name: Rodondo Logg
document_data.mainbody:
'''Rodond Logg''' was an inhabitant of [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Gods, I can't stand this place.''|Rodondo Logg}}
document_data.Description: Rodondo was a light-skinned [[Half-elf|half]] [[wood elf]] who kept his head shaven. He wore simple brown [[tunic]], trousers, and a green hat.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Rodondo Logg frequented [[The Singing Lute]] alongside his significant other, a fellow half-elf man named [[Fuschia Vineshoot]]. Rodondo hated the Lute whilst his darling loved the place and was clueless of Rodond's true feelings.
